bioconda.name: bioconductor-psygenet2r
bioconda.summary: psygenet2r - An R package for querying PsyGeNET and to perform comorbidity studies in psychiatric disorders

biotools.summary: Package to retrieve data from PsyGeNET database and to perform comorbidity studies with PsyGeNET's and user's data.

bioschemas.name: psygenet2r
bioschemas.summary: Package to retrieve data from PsyGeNET database and to perform comorbidity studies with PsyGeNET's and user's data.
